mutants.original_line: return ''.join((c if c == ' ' else next(it) for c in s))
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((c if c == ' ' else next(it) for c in s))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join((c if c == ' ' else next(it) for c in s))
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((c if c != ' ' else next(it) for c in s))

mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((c if c == '' else next(it) for c in s))
